markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dwarven Thrower](/Equipment.aspx?ID=384)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 600 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 2,750 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Warhammer](/Weapons.aspx?ID=47)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This _+2 striking [warhammer](/Weapons.aspx?ID=47)_ is inlaid with precious metals and decorated with geometric patterns in a dwarven style. If you’re a [dwarf](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=1), a _dwarven thrower_ functions for you as a _+2 greater striking [returning](/Equipment.aspx?ID=301) warhammer_ with the [thrown 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195) trait, and your attacks with the hammer deal 1d8 additional damage against [giants](/Traits.aspx?ID=79).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Dwarven Thrower

text: <title level="1" right="Item 13" pfs="Standard" > Dwarven Thrower Source Core Rulebook pg. 600 4.0 Price 2,750 gp Usage held in 1 hand Bulk 1 Base Weapon Warhammer --- This +2 striking warhammer is inlaid with precious metals and decorated with geometric patterns in a dwarven style.
